headline: Carrier Global (CARR) Achieves Breakthrough in DOE HVAC Technology Challenge
summary: Carrier Global (CARR) recently reached a milestone by being the first HVAC original equipment manufacturer to complete the DOE's Commercial Building HVAC Technology Challenge. The company's system met significant performance and efficiency markers, showcasing its commitment to energy sustainability. However, despite this achievement, Carrier's stock experienced a 1.95% decline over the past week. This movement came at a time when the Dow Jones slipped, while the Nasdaq surged to record highs...

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell CARR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Carrier Global has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small loss of 4.8% while holding steady at $62.30. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 17.7% gain during that period.
